courses.title: Introduction to Angular
courses.body: Master Angular fundamentals, including components, directives, and services to build dynamic web applications.

courses.title: JavaScript Essentials
courses.body: Learn JavaScript basics like variables, loops, and functions to kickstart your programming journey.

courses.title: Advanced TypeScript
courses.body: Explore TypeScriptâ€™s advanced features, including generics, interfaces, and type inference for robust code.

courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development
courses.body: Build full-stack apps with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and MongoDB in this comprehensive bootcamp.

courses.title: Responsive Web Design
courses.body: Create mobile-friendly websites using CSS Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design techniques.

courses.title: React for Beginners
courses.body: Get started with React, learning components, hooks, and state management for modern UIs.

courses.title: Node.js and Express
courses.body: Build scalable backend APIs with Node.js and Express, including RESTful services and middleware.

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.body: Learn Python for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning with libraries like Pandas and NumPy.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
courses.body: Understand user-centered design principles, wireframing, and prototyping for intuitive interfaces.

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.body: Explore AWS services like EC2, S3, and Lambda to build and deploy cloud-based applications.

courses.title: SQL and Database Management
courses.body: Master SQL queries, database design, and management with relational databases like MySQL.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Basics
courses.body: Learn key cybersecurity concepts, including encryption, network security, and ethical hacking.

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.body: Dive into machine learning with algorithms, model training, and tools like TensorFlow and Scikit-learn.

courses.title: Vue.js for Web Development
courses.body: Build interactive web apps with Vue.js, focusing on components, directives, and Vue Router.

courses.title: DevOps with Docker and Kubernetes
courses.body: Learn containerization and orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes for efficient app deployment.
